explains: vt. 撤销；镇压；宣布无效；捣碎

sentences.en: Graham attempted to quash rumours of growing discontent in the dressing room.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆试图澄清化妆室里日益增长的不满情绪的谣言。

sentences.en: He quickly backed down, but that did not quash discontent.
sentences.cn: 他虽然迅速收回成命，但却没有平息不满情绪。

sentences.en: That may help quash self-fulfilling expectations of higher prices.
sentences.cn: 这将对帮助打压处于较高价位的自我实现预期值。
